channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From floppy disks to flight delays: Top lawmaker warns US air system is due for a reboot
item.description: Sen. Dan Sullivan sits on the Senate Commerce Aviation subcommittee, and spoke to Fox about recent airline issues and outdated tech.

item.title: More Fizzle Than Sizzle at the Met Gala
item.description: Despite high points, a race-driven event leads to a flashy sameness.

item.title: CFOs need a new ‘playbook’ for tariff-fueled uncertainty
item.description: The Fed's decision to hold rates steady underscores a critical reality for business leaders, according to economists.

item.title: Netflix’s CEO Wants You Lonely and Miserable
item.description: The collapse of the film industry isn’t economic — it’s cultural and spiritual.

item.title: How Lead Edge Capital’s 750-strong army of backers powers its venture flywheel
item.description: Nimay Mehta on the New York VC firm’s unique approach to software investing.

item.title: A Trade War in Your Liquor Cabinet
item.description: State shipping bans are hurting businesses and violating the Constitution.

item.title: Trump: 'Major' trade deal coming Thursday
item.description: President Trump teased a "major trade deal" to be announced Thursday, saying there will be more to come.

item.title: Bank of England cuts rates again, citing Trump tariff tensions and slower growth
item.description: The BoE cuts rates to 4.25%, citing tariff-driven growth fears, even as it lifts UK GDP forecasts and inflation pressures ease.

item.title: How to Solve the Deficit Like a Genuine Capitalist
item.description: The federal government is leaving billions of dollars on the table. Hear me out.

item.title: Melinda French Gates says the Gates Foundation’s commitment to spend its entire $200 billion on global health by 2045 is ‘fantastic’: ‘The vast majority of resources were to go back to society’
item.description: French Gates has played a pivotal role in global health since the turn of the century.

item.title: Trump says U.K. is first trade deal under his tariff plan
item.description: President Trump said Thursday the U.S. struck a trade deal with the U.K. that would "cement" the countries' relationship for years to come.

item.title: Why You Should Let Someone Set You Up (Even If It Sounds Horrible)

item.title: This Bad Legal Interpretation Allows Democrats To Skew Congress With Illegal Immigration
item.description: Illegal immigrants enjoy many privileges while unlawfully in the United States — but being counted for apportionment should not be one of them.

item.title: House Committees, DOJ Turn Up The Heat On Dems’ ActBlue
item.description: The chairmen of the three committees investigating the troubled online fundraising platform have sent their finding to AG Pam Bondi.

item.title: An air traffic controller at Newark is like ‘a 3D-chess player who can juggle a chainsaw’ with their eyes closed, ex-pilot says
item.description: Air traffic controllers are taking “trauma leave” to deal with stress after the chaos at Newark.

item.title: House votes to make Trump Gulf of America name change permanent

item.title: Where Was Democrats’ Outrage When Obama And Biden Deported Illegal Alien Housekeepers And Gardeners?
item.description: No one made a peep when Obama and Biden deported millions of illegal aliens who also merely worked hard, paid taxes, and stayed out of prison.
